body.p: International Tax Reform—Pillar Two Model Rules, issued in May 2023, added paragraphs 4A and 88A–88D. An entity shall:

li.p: apply paragraphs 4A and 88A immediately upon the issue of these amendments and retrospectively in accordance with IAS 8; and

apply paragraphs 88B–88D for annual reporting periods beginning on or after 1 January 2023. An entity is not required to disclose the information required by these paragraphs for any interim period ending on or before 31 December 2023.
